# [useSignerStatus](https://github.com/alchemyplatform/aa-sdk/blob/main/account-kit/react/src/hooks/useSignerStatus.ts)

Hook to get the signer status, optionally using an override configuration. Useful if youâ€™re building your own login.

## Import

```ts twoslash
import { useSignerStatus } from "@account-kit/react";
```

## Usage

```ts twoslash
import { useSignerStatus } from "@account-kit/react";

const signerStatus = useSignerStatus();
```

## Parameters

### override

[`AlchemyAccountContextProps`](https://github.com/alchemyplatform/aa-sdk/blob/main/account-kit/react/src/context.tsx#L26)
optional configuration to override the default context

## Returns

[`UseSignerStatusResult`](https://github.com/alchemyplatform/aa-sdk/blob/main/account-kit/core/src/store/types.ts#L53)
the current state of the signer
